Articles.Content:
I have been looking for a mod that ads pulsjets to the game but i havn't found any. I even tried to make my own mod but i wasn't very succesfull so i wondering if any good modder here wants to make a pulsjet mod if you doesn't have anything els to do. I am thinking that it would be like an air breathing booster.

Hope someone likes my idea and wants to make a pulsjet mod. What do you think?

Welcome aboard, Chili365!

I'm not familiar with any mods that add pulsejets, but I'll move this thread over to General Add-on Affairs where you'll get better advice.
Would think you would need a plugin you might play around with this http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28428-Orion-aka-Ol-Boom-boom and see if you can get a jet engine to do that.

Not sure if a pulse detonation engine is the same as a pulsejet but this (May 2013) link http://www./download/q9bkctc1e88tkwq/SM-PDE.zip still works. Appears to be just a part - the config may need some updating.
LazTek's SpaceX pack adds SuperDraco thrusters which are similar to Pulsejets.
I don't see how SuperDracos are at all similar to pulsejets.

I don't see how SuperDracos are at all similar to pulsejets.

I see your point, but in the mod, at least, they work similar to Pulse Detonation Engines.
Odd that, the real life SuperDracos appear to be fairly conventional rocket engines aside from their manufacture and deep throttling.
You might like SasquatchM's Pulse Detonation Engine mod. There is an update for the config on page two for .90 compatibility.

You might like SasquatchM's Pulse Detonation Engine mod. There is an update for the config on page two for .90 compatibility.

Thanks for noting that cfg update! though the one for v0.90 is on page 6 (post #54) of the thread. SasquatchM's mods were some of my favorites back in the day. The Mediafire download still works too!
